saao/saa15/P334710
ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni ma-a {LU₂}sa-mir-i-na-a.a i-ba-aš₂-ši am-mar ina ŠU.2-ka ina BAD₃-LUGAL-GI.NA{KI} ša₂-aṣ-bit-su-nu ha-ra-ma-ma ina UGU {LU₂}na-si-ka-a-ni a-sa-par mu-uk {LU₂}NAGAR-MEŠ {LU₂}DUG.QA.BUR-MEŠ gab-bu pa-hir-a-ni lil-lik-u-ni ina pa-na-at {LU₂}hu-ub-te ša ina BAD₃-LUGAL-GI.NA{KI} li-zi-zu la i-ma-gur la i-šap-par-u-ni pi-iq-ta-at-ti e-gir₂-a-te x x ina UGU-hi {LU₂}na-si-ka-a-ni lu u₂-še-bi-il mu-uk TA ma-ṣi {LU₂}um-ma-ni la ta-šap-par-a-ni-ni dul-lu ina pa-ni-ia₂ la ep-pa-šu₂-u-ni UN-MEŠ am-mar an-na-ka x x x x ina UGU-hi-ku-nu x x x x+x ina UGU-hi x x x x x ba-si {LU₂}um-ma-ni liš-pa-ru-u-ni dul-lu ina pa-ni-ia₂ le-pu-šu u₂-ma-a ki-i ša LUGAL be-li₂ iš-pur-an-ni x x x x x+x-mi la-aš₂-šu₂ TA@v 01.en {LU₂}na-si-ki la a-da-bu-ub {LU₂}NAGAR-MEŠ {LU₂}DUG.QA.BUR-MEŠ x x x x x ap-ti-qid-di x x x x x a-nu-ut E₂ x x x x LUGAL be-li₂ x x x x x TA UGU x x x x x x-a.a x x x x x x x+x x x x x x x-bu-bu
